prompt: Night row of storage units; one half-raised door reveals a ritual heliograph rig (tripod mirror) inside. Chalk-sun and salt circle on the floor; a beam of gold light projects a sun insignia onto the corrugated slats. Amber horizon tint, keypad, and a padlock bearing the insignia.
creator: jh

rights.notes: Internal concept artwork for Pop Song Summer. Do not redistribute without permission.
